呂: six even-numbered notes of the ancient chromatic scale
Japanese seven-tone gagaku scale similar to Mixolydian mode (corresp. to: re, mi, fa, so, la, ti, do)
薦: woven straw mat (orig. made of wild rice leaves)
司: person (usually a woman) who officiates at religious ceremonies (on the Yaeyama Islands in Okinawa)
office (government department beneath a bureau under the ritsuryō system)
徴: fourth degree (of the Japanese and Chinese pentatonic scale)

翻._: unit that doubles the score of a hand

喝: exclamation used to scold practitioners (in Zen)
scolding or threatening with a shout
講: mutual assistance association (i.e. for financial assistance)
承: second line of a four-line Chinese poem
韓: China (sometimes also used in ref. to Korea or other foreign countries)
敷: suffix indicating room size (following a number of tatami mats and a counter)
破: (in gagaku or noh) middle section of a song
璧: bi (ancient Chinese artifact; flat jade or glass disc with a circular hole in the centre)
斉: Qi (kingdom in China during the Spring and Autumn Period and the Period of the Warring States)
監: special Nara-period administrative division for areas containing a detached palace (Yoshino and Izumi)

監._: third highest-ranking officials in the Dazaifu

威: leather strap binding the plates of traditional Japanese armor (armour)
亭: suffix forming the final part of the pseudonyms of some writers and performers
suffix forming the final part of the name of a restaurant
忠: inspector of the Imperial Prosecuting and Investigating Office (ritsuryō system)
庸: tax paid to avoid forced labor (ritsuryō period)
執: bow (and arrow; esp. of a noble)
巡: counter for tours, cycles, rounds, circuits, etc.
膳立て: getting one's ducks in a row
洗: water for rinsing sake cups (at a banquet, etc.)
賓: joy-bringing spirit from the divine realms
栄: winning by picking up a discarded tile
定: samadhi (state of intense concentration achieved through meditation)
萎: interpenetration of spirit between the poet and nature in a haiku
越: Yue (kingdom in ancient China; 6th C-334 BCE)
陳: grain or plant harvested more than a year ago
昭: nth year in the Shōwa era (1926.12.25-1989.1.7)
挙: recommendation (of a person for a position)
吟: stress of sound in noh song
祥: first two anniversaries of a person's death
請: privilege in criminal law given to nobles of the fifth rank or above (ritsuryō system)
貼: counter for doses of medicine, etc.
酪: acidic drink made from fermented milk (cow, sheep, mare; one of the five flavors in Buddhism)

盟._: administrative subdivision in Mongolia and Inner Mongolia

絞: death by hanging (punishment in the ritsuryō system)
